T lymphocytes express several low molecular weight transmembrane adaptor proteins that recruit src homology ( SH ) 2 domain - containing intracellular molecules to the cell membrane via tyrosine - based signaling motifs .

We describe here a novel molecule of this group termed <extra_id_0> SIT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> SHP2 interacting transmembrane adaptor protein <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) .
<extra_id_0> SIT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a disulfide - linked homodimeric glycoprotein that is expressed in lymphocytes .
